info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Carbon, south central Monroe and central Northampton Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Danielsville, or 10 miles east of Lehighton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nazareth, Palmerton, Wind Gap, Bath, Belfast, Tatamy, Danielsville, Kunkletown, Berlinsville, Beersville, Stockertown, Chapman, Fiddletown, Eastlawn Gardens and Palmer Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
